name: Impulse (itch)
description:
A speedy platformer level inspired by Sonic the Hedgehog, with momentum-based movement and 360-degree slopes and loops.

Zoom up and down crazy slopes and along walls, ceilings, and loop de loops! Explore and seek out lots of coins, or try to blast through as fast as you can. It's up to you!

Note: If the framerate is slow for you in the browser, try downloading the Windows, Mac OS X, or Linux build of the game below! That may run better on your computer.

Controls 

 Left/Right Arrow Keys or A/D: Move left/right 

Space Bar: Jump 

Enter: Pause
